OOC: I got behind on posts, all I gathered was that the tripreds have 
started retreating.
IC:

"Royalty, they are on the run!" Inferno exclaimed, then looked at his 
hand realizing it was missing afew fingers.

"Haha! They we gave 'em what they had commin to 'em!" Quickstrike 
said getting up "I think I mighta gotten alittle damaged" Quickstrike 
said, his left arm then fell off "Dagnabbit!" 

Waspinator was still in Stasis lock.
___________________
Kenzo landed near the place (The maximals are still there right?)
